issue.title: [C++] Adding a column to an empty Table fails
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1865](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1865). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If we remove a column from a table and add new column (probably a casted version of it), it is rejected as the Table `num_rows` was reset to 0:

```Java

Invalid: Added column's length must match table's length. Expected length 0 but got length 1
```
